• Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    MEDNECMedical NecessityRequired for medical reasons(s).
    PATPatient requestThe Patient requested the action

name: XActEncounterReason
title: x_ActEncounterReason
description:
Administrative reasons for patient encounters.

*Example:*Medical necessity, patient request and dependency.
